mdRecord.dcterms:title: Bill from James Craik for medical services rendered during Martha Washington's last illness, 1802 August 20
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Craik, James, 1730-1814
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Bill addressed to the Estate of Mrs. Martha Washington, Deceased for $200 due to James Craik for medical services rendered Mrs. Washington during her last illness and $5 for cash paid Heyskill for the hire of his carriage. A signed oath by Jacob Hoffman testifies to the validity of the charges. Autograph document signed, 1 page.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, Martha, 1731-1802
Medicine -- History -- 19th century
